data.persona: Me and my love have stowed away once more to the shadowy places under the food stores. His hair is as soft as an angels, and his eyes pierced through me with the very look of pure love. These are the best of days. I'm sure of it.
data.description:
You are in the Cave.
This cave is big but has no lights. It is made from stone and has a small pool of water in the back. The floor is made from dirt.
There's a stone, a floor, a the village, a dirt, a small pool of water, a stored jugs of water, and an a small pool of water here.
The fruit bat is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wearing a Legging.

data.mid_motivation: I must wet my lips so I can smooch on my lover
data.long_motivation: I yearn for the days when I do not have to hide my love and hope that I can tell our families of our love at the festival next month
